commit.message:
emit-rtl.c (try_split): Use delete_insns.


	* emit-rtl.c (try_split): Use delete_insns.
	* recog.c (split_all_insns): Fix terminating condition.

From-SVN: r50778

+	* recog.c (split_all_insns): Fix terminating condition.
